title: rspec-core 2.4.0 fails spec: RSpec::Core::RakeTask with paths with quotes escapes the quotes
body:
This looks like an ordering issue, but I'm not sure what the right fix is, i.e. whether the :files_to_run method garantuees any particular order. 
Failures:

  1) RSpec::Core::RakeTask with paths with quotes escapes the quotes
     Failure/Error: @task.__send__(:files_to_run).should eq([
       
       expected ["/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/first_spec.rb", "/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/second_\\\"spec.rb", "/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/third_\\'spec.rb"]
            got ["/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/third_\\'spec.rb", "/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/second_\\\"spec.rb", "/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/first_spec.rb"]
       
       (compared using ==)
       
       Diff:
       @@ -1,4 +1,2 @@
       -["/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/first_spec.rb",
       - "/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/second_\\\"spec.rb",
       - "/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/third_\\'spec.rb"]
       +["/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/third_\\'spec.rb", "/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/second_\\\"spec.rb", "/var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/rspec-core-2.4.0/work/ruby18/rspec-core-2.4.0/tmp/rake_task_example/first_spec.rb"]
     # ./spec/rspec/core/rake_task_spec.rb:153
